Class AnimationFactory

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.view.animation.AnimationFactory
public final class AnimationFactory extends Object
Factory for creating common game animations. Centralizes animation creation logic to reduce duplication.

  • Method Details

    • createFloatingTextAnimation

      public static javafx.animation.ParallelTransition createFloatingTextAnimation(String text, double x, double y, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.Group container)
      Creates a floating text animation that scales, fades, and moves upward.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display
      x - The X position
      y - The Y position
      color - The text color
      container - The container group to add the text to
      Returns:
      A ParallelTransition that can be played

    • createBlinkAnimation

      public static javafx.animation.FadeTransition createBlinkAnimation(javafx.scene.Node target, long durationMillis, int cycleCount)
      Creates a fade transition for blinking effect.
      Parameters:
      target - The node to animate
      durationMillis - Duration in milliseconds
      cycleCount - Number of cycles
      Returns:
      A FadeTransition configured for blinking
